# lighter-json Change Log

## v2.0.0 - 2017-02-22
* `major` Changing "read" and "write" to "reader" and "writer".

## v1.0.2 - 2016-07-20
* `patch` Treating constructor-created equivalents as primitives.

## v1.0.1 - 2015-12-15
* `patch` Fixed colorize indentation.

## v1.0.0 - 2015-12-15
* `major` Initial release.
